title: unesco_heritage_Elephanta_Caves
text:
Name: Elephanta Caves. short_description:

The 'City of Caves', on an island in the Sea of Oman close to Bombay, contains a collection of rock art linked to the cult of Shiva. Here, Indian art has found one of its most perfect expressions, particularly the huge high reliefs in the main cave.

. date_inscribed: 1987. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 72.93583. latitude: 18.96667. area_hectares: 0. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: India. Region: Asia and the Pacific. iso_code: in. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: rev.
